name: Escape Memoirs: Questionable Side Stories
description:
Escape Memoirs: Questionable Side Stories is a humorous co-operative escape room game where you are looking to get hired by an international criminal organisation. Unfortunately for you, the job interview is being held in a very inconvenient location, and you must make your way through an old sewer system to get there. To make it in time, you must make good use of your wits to overcome the challenges that await you in the sewers.



Features

  • Play solo, or grab a friend or four.
  • Wide variety of simple and fun puzzles, that are sure to make you laugh, or at least to make your friends laugh at you.
  • Plenty of hidden collectibles to find.

MORE ESCAPE ROOMS
